SELECT e.name AS parentName, t.id, t.name, t.code, t.parent_id AS parentId, t.icon AS linkIcon, t.is_inner AS isInner, t.resource_id AS resourceId, t.resource_name AS resourceName, t.url, t.status, t.sort, t.create_date as createDate, t.update_date as updateDate, t.create_person_id as createPersonId, t.create_person_name as createPersonName, t.update_person_id as updatePersonId, t.update_person_name as updatePersonName, t.create_org_id as createOrgId, t.create_org_name as createOrgName, t.create_company_id as createCompanyId, t.create_company_name as createCompanyName, t.concurrency_version as concurrencyVersion, t.delflag FROM oa_sys_quick_entry t LEFT JOIN oa_sys_quick_entry e ON t.parent_id = e.id where 1=1
and t.parent_id = #{parentId}
and t.parent_id='0'
and t.delflag=0 order by t.sort

SELECT t.id, t.name, t.code, t.parent_id AS parentId, t.icon AS linkIcon, t.is_inner AS isInner, t.resource_id AS resourceId, t.resource_name AS resourceName, t.url, t.status, t.sort, t.create_date as createDate, t.update_date as updateDate, t.create_person_id as createPersonId, t.create_person_name as createPersonName, t.update_person_id as updatePersonId, t.update_person_name as updatePersonName, t.create_org_id as createOrgId, t.create_org_name as createOrgName, t.create_company_id as createCompanyId, t.create_company_name as createCompanyName, t.concurrency_version as concurrencyVersion, t.delflag FROM oa_sys_quick_entry t where 1=1 and t.delflag=0 and t.status = 1
and ( t.code like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{code}),'%') or t.name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{name}),'%') or t.resource_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{resourceName}),'%') )
order by t.sort desc
